name: Emory Gillespie
bio: Emory Gillespie is the minister of First Presbyterian Church in Mt. Vernon, Iowa.  She teaches Religion and Literature at Cornell College and has published articles in the Wapsipinicon Almanac, Lectionary Homiletics and Journal for Preachers.  Emory enjoys her family; Bob who at this moment is fly fishing, Tom Henry who is practicing with his rock band in the basement and Raina, who has two mice.  Emory aspires to publish her two novels.
